name: getUsersFromGroup
description:
Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all users in a group.

Note that users are ordered by username, however the username is not returned in the results due to privacy reasons.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

groupname.description:
As a group's name can change, use of `groupId` is recommended to identify a group.  
The name of the group. This parameter cannot be used with the `groupId` parameter.

groupId.description: The ID of the group. This parameter cannot be used with the `groupName` parameter.

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

$ul: **isLast**: Whether this is the last page.
**maxResults**: The maximum number of items that could be returned.
**nextPage**: If there is another page of results, the URL of the next page.
**startAt**: The index of the first item returned.
